snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is taking trips intended to highlight projects that illustrate his economic development strategy, but which some critics have suggested are a centralized form of pork.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo visits central New York, first of 10 planned trips around the state intended to showcase numerous projects that have been brought to life on his watch, and to allow for some encouragement of local officials.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is taking trips intended to highlight projects that illustrate his economic development strategy, but which some critics have suggested are a centralized form of pork.

headline.seo: Cuomo Tours State to Highlight Economic Development Strategy
headline.main: Our Next Stop, Governor: Another Development Site Helped by Your Policies
headline.print_headline: Our Next Stop, Governor: Another Development Site Helped by Your Policies
